links.title: You: "(Point to it.) "There. The buckle h..."
links.text: (Point to it.) "There. The buckle holds the belt together."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Where?" He corrects his glasses. "..."
links.text: "Where?" He corrects his glasses. "Ah, yes. I see. If the shot hits that there *might* be a chance to release the belt..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, now we're talkin'. Entertain..."
links.text: "Yeah, now we're talkin'. Entertain the Cuno with some shit."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""They'll miss. The pigs will miss,..."
links.text: "They'll miss. The pigs will miss, Cuno!"

links.title: Suggestion: "The lieutenant is undecided. On one..."
links.text: The lieutenant is undecided. On one hand he *wants* to shoot some gun -- on the other, it's an awfully stupid idea.

links.title: You: ""I don't know, just, you know -- sh..."
links.text: "I don't know, just, you know -- shoot up there maybe?" (Point towards the branch.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes..." He corrects his glasses. "..."
links.text: "Yes..." He corrects his glasses. "The buckle -- where it ties the cargo belt to the tree. If the shot hits that then there might be a small chance to release the belt..."

links.title: You: ""Just shoot the belt, the bullet wi..."
links.text: "Just shoot the belt, the bullet will break it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It absolutely will not, officer. T..."
links.text: "It absolutely will not, officer. That's not how physics work. It will maybe cut *one* thread loose."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, you should shoot him down. N..."
links.text: "Yeah, you should shoot him down. No other way."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He breathes out heavily."
links.text: He breathes out heavily.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Oh yeah! Do this shit! Fuck it up!""
links.text: "Oh yeah! Do this shit! Fuck it up!"

links.title: You: ""Take the shot, lieutenant -- what'..."
links.text: "Take the shot, lieutenant -- what's the worst thing that could happen?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'll blow his head off.""
links.text: "I'll blow his head off."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Take it! TAKE THE SHOT!""
links.text: "Take it! TAKE THE SHOT!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, take the shot, Cuno wants so..."
links.text: "Yeah, take the shot, Cuno wants some of that shit."

links.title: You: ""Actually -- don't. It has *bad ide..."
links.text: "Actually -- don't. It has *bad idea* written all over it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But... what *else* can we do?""
links.text: "But... what *else* can we do?"

links.title: You: ""Wait. Let *me* try.""
links.text: "Wait. Let *me* try."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant's brow is furrowed...."
links.text: The lieutenant's brow is furrowed. He appears too deep in concentration to even notice what you said.

links.title: You: "Say nothing -- let him choose."
links.text: Say nothing -- let him choose.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Silence. With his elbows sharp, the..."
links.text: Silence. With his elbows sharp, the lieutenant unzips his jacket...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "...and produces a lightweight firea..."
links.text: ...and produces a lightweight firearm. He drops a paper cartridge in the barrel, separates the scouring stick and gives the cartridge five tucks.

links.title: Interfacing: "Securing it in place."
links.text: Securing it in place.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "That's a Kiejl A9/90 Armistice mass..."
links.text: That's a Kiejl A9/90 Armistice mass-produced muzzleloader. Ascetic, frugal, one of the most common firearms in the world.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He then steps back and assumes the..."
links.text: He then steps back and assumes the Falostesse position, taking aim. The corner of his eye twitches -- his finger is on the trigger...

links.title: You: ""Easy does it, partner.""
links.text: "Easy does it, partner."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""He's gonna fucking mi...""
links.text: "He's gonna fucking mi..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The kid's voice is drowned in a shr..."
links.text: The kid's voice is drowned in a shrill blast that echoes off the walls of the surrounding tenements. A cloud of smoke slowly parts in the air, as the lieutenant steps back and says to himself...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""God damn it.""
links.text: "God damn it."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "A lot of things were wrong with tha..."
links.text: A lot of things were wrong with that shot: the Falostesse was the wrong choice, his shoulders were raised, but above all -- he cannot trust his eyesight.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "OH MY GOD, that was so many types o..."
links.text: OH MY GOD, that was so many types of wrong -- who taught four-eyes to shoot?! Whip up a gruelling training regiment for him RIGHT NOW. Beat THE MAN into him, go go go!

links.title: Empathy: "He feels bad about it. About his ey..."
links.text: He feels bad about it. About his eyes mostly, just having bad eyesight -- probably from a young age. Whatever you do, do not *console* him.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""FUCKING IDIOT! Mulkkupää asshole!""
links.text: "FUCKING IDIOT! Mulkkupää asshole!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno could've hit it easy, but the..."
links.text: "Cuno could've hit it easy, but then -- Cuno's not fucking handicapped, is he?"

links.title: You: ""What THE HELL is wrong with you, S..."
links.text: "What THE HELL is wrong with you, Sally!? You need to square your shoulders!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think you have your sports mixed..."
links.text: "I think you have your sports mixed up there, officer, squaring my shoulders has nothing to do with this."

links.title: Cuno: ""Bitches fighting.""
links.text: "Bitches fighting."

links.title: You: ""It's okay, man.""
links.text: "It's okay, man."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's sorry too. Cuno feels sorry..."
links.text: "Cuno's sorry too. Cuno feels sorry for the binoclard."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant doesn't say a word,..."
links.text: The lieutenant doesn't say a word, just looks at the gun in his hand.

links.title: You: ""God dammit, get your shit together!""
links.text: "God dammit, get your shit together!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Remain collegial, officer. It was..."
links.text: "Remain collegial, officer. It was an honest mistake -- and I will not repeat it."

links.title: You: ""Try again, maybe?""
links.text: "Try again, maybe?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, we're lucky as it is. We didn'..."
links.text: "No, we're lucky as it is. We didn't break anything -- and the victim remains uncompromised." He looks around, at the windows overlooking the yard.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Any more mistakes could put us in..."
links.text: "Any more mistakes could put us in an unfortunate position with the locals. We have eyes on us. I didn't do us any favours with that."

links.title: You: ""What now?" (Conclude.)"
links.text: "What now?" (Conclude.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have to say, it's beginning to l..."
links.text: "I have to say, it's beginning to look unlikely we can get him down without *assistance*."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "You know, you don't feel like too b..."
links.text: You know, you don't feel like too bad of a shot yourself...

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Take his gun and show him how to us..."
links.text: Take his gun and show him how to use it.

links.title: Empathy: "He feels bad about it. About his ey..."
links.text: He feels bad about it. About his eyes mostly, just having bad eyesight -- probably from a young age. Whatever you do, do not *console* him.

links.title: You: ""Shoot that motherfucker down.""
links.text: "Shoot that motherfucker down."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: You: ""I don't know how. Maybe it's bette..."
links.text: "I don't know how. Maybe it's better not to..." (Back off.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What else can we do?""
links.text: "What else can we do?"

links.title: You: ""Can I have the gun? I should try.""
links.text: "Can I have the gun? I should try."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's bad as it is -- us shooting f..."
links.text: "It's bad as it is -- us shooting firearms like punks..." He pauses, then shrugs and proceeds to load the pistolette...

links.title: Rhetoric: "No, of course not -- this time we s..."
links.text: No, of course not -- this time we shoot someone *else*!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Go ahead, I'm not stopping you. Ju..."
links.text: "Go ahead, I'm not stopping you. Just don't lose it." The Armistice A9 shines in his outstretched hand.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""They only have ONE GUN!""
links.text: "They only have ONE GUN!"

links.title: Cuno: ""This is the sorriest pair of pigs..."
links.text: "This is the sorriest pair of pigs Cuno's ever seen."

links.title: You: "Take the gun."
links.text: Take the gun.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Yeah, take it you fucking *banaani..."
links.text: "Yeah, take it you fucking *banaanipoika*. Take it and shoot yourself in the mouth!"

links.title: You: "Feel the weight first."
links.text: Feel the weight first.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "The cold piece of bakelite and gunm..."
links.text: The cold piece of bakelite and gunmetal is surprisingly light. Your finger fits right through the guard, instinctively resting on the trigger.

links.title: Interfacing: "You've held this -- an A9 Armistice..."
links.text: You've held this -- an A9 Armistice -- before. At some point it probably used to be your choice of firearm. It still feels comfortable, like you never laid it down.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""The fuck are you waiting for, Cuno..."
links.text: "The fuck are you waiting for, Cuno?! Tell him to shoot himself in the mouth!"

links.title: Half Light: "Cuno is silent. Aggression gathers..."
links.text: Cuno is silent. Aggression gathers in the air, the trigger feels delicate and ready to break under your finger.

links.title: You: "Point the gun at the belt."
links.text: Point the gun at the belt.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "The buckle comes into focus in your..."
links.text: The buckle comes into focus in your sights. You stand with your feet planted firmly in the ground and your left hand supporting your gun arm...

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Why don't you just shoot yourself..."
links.text: "Why don't you just shoot yourself in your f****t mouth?" she hisses. "At least you won't miss."

links.title: Empathy: "This isn't mere boundary pushing. T..."
links.text: This isn't mere boundary pushing. There is a true suicidal rage in the kid as she's provoking you.

links.title: You: "Say: "Shut up.""
links.text: Say: "Shut up."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Or what? You gonna *fuck* me?" Her..."
links.text: "Or what? You gonna *fuck* me?" Her voice is almost a whisper now: "You wanna fuck me, pig? Is that what this is about?"

links.title: You: "Pull the trigger."
links.text: Pull the trigger.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "The buckle explodes into tiny piece..."
links.text: The buckle explodes into tiny pieces, coming loose with a *whirr*.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "With your hand numb from the recoil..."
links.text: With your hand numb from the recoil, you look at the body slump down. For a moment the man appears to *kneel* in front of you.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Looking straight at you. Helpless,..."
links.text: Looking straight at you. Helpless, trapped within itself.

links.title: You: "Who killed you?"
links.text: Who killed you?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Communism."
links.text: Communism.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "It takes a millisecond for the asso..."
links.text: It takes a millisecond for the association to flash within your cortex. You have no idea *where* it's coming from -- only that it's *right*.

links.title: You: "Turn away."
links.text: Turn away.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Then the *rigor* in his muscles giv..."
links.text: Then the *rigor* in his muscles gives up, and he smashes sideways into the spring mud, letting out a horrid stench.

links.title: You: ""You've been policed.""
links.text: "You've been policed."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ace's high!" The lieutenant raises..."
links.text: "Ace's high!" The lieutenant raises his right hand, waiting for you to slap it.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The Ace's High -- a custom invented..."
links.text: The Ace's High -- a custom invented by the aerostatic brigades during the Revolution -- is used to celebrate success in Revachol. Especially in sports. The gesture has spread across the world, despite the defeat of the revolutionaries themselves.

links.title: Interfacing: "You could add an Ace's Low to it, i..."
links.text: You could add an Ace's Low to it, if you like. By turning your back after the High and waiting for another.

links.title: You: "Slap it."
links.text: Slap it.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant takes a little hop t..."
links.text: The lieutenant takes a little hop to perform the customary salutation. Your palm hurts from the slap. It's precise and down to the point.

links.title: Cuno: ""I knew these guys were f****ts." H..."
links.text: "I knew these guys were f****ts." His voice is deeply approving.

links.title: You: ""No, we're *not*!""
links.text: "No, we're *not*!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer, let's keep our attention..."
links.text: "Officer, let's keep our attention on the victim."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, we're f****ts, got a problem..."
links.text: "Yeah, we're f****ts, got a problem with it?!"

links.title: Cuno: "Cuno cracks with laughter -- sounds..."
links.text: Cuno cracks with laughter -- sounds like someone strangling a seagull. It's clear he enjoys himself.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""I knew they suck each other off.""
links.text: "I knew they suck each other off."

links.title: You: ""What now?""
links.text: "What now?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We will perform a field autopsy an..."
links.text: "We will perform a field autopsy and determine the cause of death -- but before... excuse me." He needs to turn away from the corpse.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "Slumped on the ground like that has..."
links.text: Slumped on the ground like that has not *improved* the way the corpse smells -- the fall seems to have released something deep inside it...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It looks like *I* feel like taking..."
links.text: "It looks like *I* feel like taking a break from the stench. I'm sorry to interrupt the jubilations here -- just a little breather before we do the autopsy."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The stench is getting bad. I'm sor..."
links.text: "The stench is getting bad. I'm sorry to interrupt the jubilations here -- I need a little breather before we do the autopsy."

links.title: You: "Slap it and wait for an Ace's Low."
links.text: Slap it and wait for an Ace's Low.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The High arrives with a sharp slap...."
links.text: The High arrives with a sharp slap. As you turn around there is a moment of doubt -- feels like that Low ain't gonna *connect*...

links.title: Interfacing: "Chill. It's *gonna* connect."
links.text: Chill. It's *gonna* connect.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "But then it does -- and with furiou..."
links.text: But then it does -- and with furious precision! The lieutenant is not one to leave an Ace's Low *hanging*.

links.title: You: "Leave him hanging."
links.text: Leave him hanging.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay," he mumbles for a second, th..."
links.text: "Okay," he mumbles for a second, then lowers his hand. "Maybe it's not customary in the 41st to perform an Ace's High. In the 57th we've carried over the custom from the Revolution. Maybe it's bad luck... anyway."

links.title: Empathy: "You *left him hanging* on an Ace's..."
links.text: You *left him hanging* on an Ace's High?! What is wrong with you, you sharpshooting asshole?

links.title: You: ""RCM, baby! RCM!""
links.text: "RCM, baby! RCM!"

links.title: You: ""How did I *do* that?""
links.text: "How did I *do* that?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""By being a damn good shot -- Ace's..."
links.text: "By being a damn good shot -- Ace's High!" The lieutenant raises his right hand, waiting for you to slap it.

links.title: You: ""Who's laughing now, you little shi..."
links.text: "Who's laughing now, you little shit!?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Fuck you, *kyrpäle*!" Despite her..."
links.text: "Fuck you, *kyrpäle*!" Despite her words, her tone seems celebratory.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "A plume of smoke erupts from the ba..."
links.text: A plume of smoke erupts from the barrel. Your hand goes numb from the explosion. With your ears still ringing you lower the weapon to see what happened.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "You missed the belt, but hit the co..."
links.text: You missed the belt, but hit the corpse straight in the chest. Bits of ribcage protrude from the skin. No blood, only a murky sludge dripping down his belly. The sudden stink makes your eyes water.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Oh my god, he's gonna fucking cry,..."
links.text: "Oh my god, he's gonna fucking cry, I knew it! What a *mulkku*..."

links.title: Volition: "Are you? Because it sort of feels l..."
links.text: Are you? Because it sort of feels like you *are*. Please don't cry.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Ask for another shot. You'll get it..."
links.text: Ask for another shot. You'll get it with the next one, the god damn light reflected off some window, surely...

links.title: You: ""Can you reload it, please? I need..."
links.text: "Can you reload it, please? I need another shot."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The cadaver is already compromised..."
links.text: "The cadaver is already compromised bad enough. We don't have to make it *worse*."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "It came out wrong, you made it soun..."
links.text: It came out wrong, you made it sound like you're some sort of roulette addict looking for a fix, ask again, more controlled this time:

links.title: You: ""Please, Kim.""
links.text: "Please, Kim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "There is silence."
links.text: There is silence.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""*Vittupää* wants to fuck up again,..."
links.text: "*Vittupää* wants to fuck up again, bad."

links.title: You: "Swallow defeat."
links.text: Swallow defeat.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Feels like shit man, how did this h..."
links.text: Feels like shit man, how did this happen? Hit him straight in the chest... how horrible, you're so sorry.

links.title: You: "*"Mulkku*, *vittupää*? What is that..."
links.text: *"Mulkku*, *vittupää*? What is that?! What the hell kind of words are those?!"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""It's the song of my people, asshol..."
links.text: "It's the song of my people, asshole!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't provoke her." The lieutenant..."
links.text: "Don't provoke her." The lieutenant takes his sidearm from you, then holsters it.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Shot him in the chest." The creatu..."
links.text: "Shot him in the chest." The creature is still in disbelief. "What a FUCKING IDIOT."

links.title: You: ""There's something wrong with your..."
links.text: "There's something wrong with your weapon, lieutenant. It keeps missing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The *Armistice* is sufficiently pr..."
links.text: "The *Armistice* is sufficiently precise, officer. Especially at close range." He takes his sidearm from you and holsters it.

links.title: Cuno: ""It's not the gun's fault you can't..."
links.text: "It's not the gun's fault you can't shoot. It's your pig-hands."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Pigs don't have hands. They have,..."
links.text: "Pigs don't have hands. They have, like, fucking hoofs or something."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno has hands." He displays his l..."
links.text: "Cuno has hands." He displays his little fingers, they're pink. "Cuno can shoot that shit down for you."

links.title: You: ""No, Cuno. If I can't shoot him dow..."
links.text: "No, Cuno. If I can't shoot him down, no one will."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Cop's bitter cos' he fucked that c..."
links.text: "Cop's bitter cos' he fucked that corpse up, Cuno. What a fucking *kyrpelö*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We still need to get him down *som..."
links.text: "We still need to get him down *somehow*." His tone is growing tired now -- the stench makes him turn away from the corpse.

links.title: You: ""But *how*?""
links.text: "But *how*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The *bad* way -- the way I didn't..."
links.text: "The *bad* way -- the way I didn't want us to." He sighs. "By asking the harbour for help. They have the tools and the men. If they put him up there -- they can take him down too."

links.title: You: ""Lieutenant, we should entrust Cuno..."
links.text: "Lieutenant, we should entrust Cuno with your service weapon. He says he can shoot it down."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant does not dignify tha..."
links.text: The lieutenant does not dignify that with an answer. He snaps the button on his holster and says...

links.title: You: ""That's preposterous. We're not giv..."
links.text: "That's preposterous. We're not giving you the gun, kid."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""That's *preposterous*," she whines..."
links.text: "That's *preposterous*," she whines mockingly. "What are you, a fucking earl?"

links.title: You: ""I don't wanna do this anymore, thi..."
links.text: "I don't wanna do this anymore, this is boring."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I agree. Police work is overrated...."
links.text: "I agree. Police work is overrated. It is trying and stressful. However, it is still our job to get the dead body down from the tree." He takes his sidearm from you and holsters it.

links.title: You: "Start crying -- you're sensitive."
links.text: Start crying -- you're sensitive.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "It feels dry. Nothing comes out of..."
links.text: It feels dry. Nothing comes out of you as you stretch and bend your face into a crying shape. You're too furious to cry, apparently.

links.title: You: ""I can't even cry..." (Throw the gu..."
links.text: "I can't even cry..." (Throw the gun in the mud.)

links.title: Cuno: ""What did he say?""
links.text: "What did he say?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""The f****t can't even cry.""
links.text: "The f****t can't even cry."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant picks up his gun and..."
links.text: The lieutenant picks up his gun and then holsters it. "In the name of god, please get a hang of yourself."

links.title: Empathy: "He's definitely not impressed by th..."
links.text: He's definitely not impressed by the way you're handling it, but he doesn't hold it against you either. He's supportive like that.

links.title: You: "Try harder. Try *really* hard to cr..."
links.text: Try harder. Try *really* hard to cry.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant watches you jerk som..."
links.text: The lieutenant watches you jerk some tears, your shoulders shaking and your eyes dry. The gun begins to slip from your fingers.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""*Jumalauta*! The f****t can't even..."
links.text: "*Jumalauta*! The f****t can't even cry."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "You hear that, Sally? They're *laug..."
links.text: You hear that, Sally? They're *laughing* at you. Are you gonna let it stand? Are you, Sally? Or are you gonna CRY LIKE A BEAST?! Like a BEAAAST!

links.title: You: "What was that?"
links.text: What was that?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "*DO IT!*"
links.text: *DO IT!*

links.title: You: "I'll do it, coach!"
links.text: I'll do it, coach!

links.title: The Hanged Man: "A tiny tear forms on your duct. The..."
links.text: A tiny tear forms on your duct. The corpse stinks from the blackened bullet hole in his chest. A single drop of decay liquid runs out of it, then down his stomach...

links.title: You: "Don't take coach Physical Instrumen..."
links.text: Don't take coach Physical Instrument's advice. It's bad advice.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant gently picks his gun..."
links.text: The lieutenant gently picks his gun from your hand and holsters it.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant gently picks his gun..."
links.text: The lieutenant gently picks his gun from your hand and holsters it.

links.title: You: "(Give the gun back to Kim.) "What n..."
links.text: (Give the gun back to Kim.) "What now?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We try something else.""
links.text: "We try something else."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Oh my god, what a fucking boring c..."
links.text: "Oh my god, what a fucking boring cop."

links.title: Cuno: ""Nice shot, though. Fucked him up g..."
links.text: "Nice shot, though. Fucked him up good..."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He doesn't mean it in earnest. It's..."
links.text: He doesn't mean it in earnest. It's a cruel jest. He's going to say as much too, just you wait:

links.title: Cuno: ""Actually it was f****ted. Cuno jus..."
links.text: "Actually it was f****ted. Cuno just said that because he felt sorry for you, pig. It's not your fault you can't shoot -- it's your pig-hands."

links.title: You: "Close your left eye first."
links.text: Close your left eye first.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Your field of view narrows. The bra..."
links.text: Your field of view narrows. The branch slowly moves, becoming entirely two-dimensional. The metal buckle glimmers, slick with the falling rain. The corpse slowly rotates...

links.title: Visual Calculus: "The slow movement of the branch in..."
links.text: The slow movement of the branch in the wind and your shoulders directing the gun sync up, dancing hypnotically.

links.title: Volition: "As you wait, your breathing slows d..."
links.text: As you wait, your breathing slows down. Some mosquito-like organism buzzes in your peripheral:

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Look, he's crying! You gonna cry n..."
links.text: "Look, he's crying! You gonna cry now, fucking *fägäri*?"

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Your field of view narrows. The bra..."
links.text: Your field of view narrows. The branch slowly moves, becoming entirely two-dimensional. The metal buckle glimmers, catching the morning light as the corpse slowly rotates.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Your field of view narrows. The bra..."
links.text: Your field of view narrows. The branch slowly moves, becoming entirely two-dimensional. The metal buckle glimmers as the corpse slowly rotates.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Your field of view narrows. The bra..."
links.text: Your field of view narrows. The branch slowly moves, becoming entirely two-dimensional. The metal buckle glimmers, catching the evening light as the corpse slowly rotates.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Your field of view narrows. The bra..."
links.text: Your field of view narrows. The branch slowly moves, becoming entirely two-dimensional. The metal buckle glimmers, catching the noon light as the corpse slowly rotates.

links.title: You: "Point the gun at Cunoesse."
links.text: Point the gun at Cunoesse.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Do it, f****t! SET ME FREE!""
links.text: "Do it, f****t! SET ME FREE!"

links.title: Inland Empire: "You feel as though it would be *dan..."
links.text: You feel as though it would be *dangerous* to set this creature free to roam about the cosmos.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't." You feel the lieutenant's..."
links.text: "Don't." You feel the lieutenant's hand on your shoulder.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""F****T!" She's ripping her blazer..."
links.text: "F****T!" She's ripping her blazer open to bare her chest. "DO IT!"

links.title: You: ""Fuck you little shit!""
links.text: "Fuck you little shit!"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Put it right here *mulkku*," she p..."
links.text: "Put it right here *mulkku*," she points to her heart. "RIGHT HERE!"

links.title: You: "Point the gun at the belt."
links.text: Point the gun at the belt.

links.title: Cuno: ""Intense shit, copper.""
links.text: "Intense shit, copper."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""F****t waved his gun." She pants,..."
links.text: "F****t waved his gun." She pants, breathless with excitement. "It wasn't intense, it was pathetic."

links.title: You: "Pull the trigger."
links.text: Pull the trigger.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "The sound of the explosion from you..."
links.text: The sound of the explosion from your gun echoes over all of Martinaise. The bullet found its way to the heart of a kid.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "You hear an explosion within the we..."
links.text: You hear an explosion within the weapon in your hands. The branches of the pinetree behind the girl shake ever so lightly. Your ears are still ringing...

links.title: Cunoesse: "A plume of smoke has erupted from t..."
links.text: A plume of smoke has erupted from the barrel. The little monstrosity stands in the cloud. Her face is petrified, then it begins to twist, demonically.

links.title: Empathy: "She is disappointed, *trapped*, ent..."
links.text: She is disappointed, *trapped*, entangled in this world -- all because of the continuously *appalling* marksmanship of law officials.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""YOU FUCKING F****TS!" she wails. "..."
links.text: "YOU FUCKING F****TS!" she wails. "LEARN TO SHOOT."
