links.text: "Whoah, C..." Cuno's voice is low. "Pig tried to shoot you. You're *alive*."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Yes, Cuno, I CAN SEE THAT.""
links.text: "Yes, Cuno, I CAN SEE THAT."

links.title: Drama: "My liege, it may be possible to *sp..."
links.text: My liege, it may be possible to *spin* this as some sort of, uhm... pedagogical exercise.

links.title: You: "Yes, of course -- attempted child m..."
links.text: Yes, of course -- attempted child murder, that's not *me*.

links.title: Drama: "Not you at all, no-no-no!"
links.text: Not you at all, no-no-no!

links.title: You: "But I wasn't trying to teach her a..."
links.text: But I wasn't trying to teach her a lesson. I was trying to *kill* her.

links.title: Drama: "Well, then maybe you shouldn't have..."
links.text: Well, then maybe you shouldn't have missed. This is merely a suggestion. If you want to be a *failed* child murderer, go with that.

links.title: You: ""I was merely teaching her a lesson..."
links.text: "I was merely teaching her a lesson, of course."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "You sense nylon moving somewhere to..."
links.text: You sense nylon moving somewhere to your left. There's motion in your peripherals, then it's already too late...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And what kind of lesson is that?"..."
links.text: "And what kind of lesson is that?" Just like that the gun has left your hand. The lieutenant holsters it.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""That he's a fucking f****t who mis..."
links.text: "That he's a fucking f****t who misses."

links.title: You: ""What are you Kim, a martial artist..."
links.text: "What are you Kim, a martial artist? Where'd the gun go?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That is not important right now.""
links.text: "That is not important right now."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, a lesson about respecting th..."
links.text: "Yeah, a lesson about respecting the law."

links.title: You: ""It was merely a jest. A light-hear..."
links.text: "It was merely a jest. A light-hearted jab!"

links.title: You: ""Fucking die!" (Throw the empty gun..."
links.text: "Fucking die!" (Throw the empty gun at her.)

links.title: Reaction Speed: "You sense nylon moving somewhere to..."
links.text: You sense nylon moving somewhere to your left. There's motion in your peripherals, then it's already too late...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The gun has left your hand, still n..."
links.text: The gun has left your hand, still numb from the recoil. The lieutenant holsters it under his arm.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think you're underestimating the..."
links.text: "I think you're underestimating the gravity of this situation, officer. We need to take a breather from this scene." He points at you. "Now."

links.title: You: ""Kim, I need you to do your reload-..."
links.text: "Kim, I need you to do your reload-thing, the beast is still alive."

links.title: You: ""Oh my god, why did I just try to s..."
links.text: "Oh my god, why did I just try to shoot a kid?"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "You sense nylon moving somewhere to..."
links.text: You sense nylon moving somewhere to your left. There's motion in your peripherals, then it's already too late...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The gun has left your hand, still n..."
links.text: The gun has left your hand, still numb from the recoil. The lieutenant holsters it under his arm.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""At least you understand the gravit..."
links.text: "At least you understand the gravity of the situation, detective. We need to take a breather from this scene." He points at you. "Now."

links.title: You: "Give the gun back to Lieutenant Kit..."
links.text: Give the gun back to Lieutenant Kitsuragi. (Don't shoot.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant takes the gun carefu..."
links.text: The lieutenant takes the gun carefully from you and holsters it. His eyes are narrow and he doesn't comment on your antics.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Fucking pussy didn't shoot shit, d..."
links.text: "Fucking pussy didn't shoot shit, did he? Didn't shoot me, didn't shoot himself in the mouth..."

links.title: Empathy: ""Didn't shoot *me*." There is since..."
links.text: "Didn't shoot *me*." There is sincere disappointment on her face. This kid was expecting *pandemonium* and release from her mortal coil.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I agree." The lieutenant holsters..."
links.text: "I agree." The lieutenant holsters the weapon with a quick move. "Enough gunslinging for today."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Go ahead, I'm not stopping you. Ju..."
links.text: "Go ahead, I'm not stopping you. Just don't lose it." The piece shines in his outstretched hand.

links.title: You: ""I can try to shoot him down myself.""
links.text: "I can try to shoot him down myself."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This had better not turn into anot..."
links.text: "This had better not turn into another *demonstration* of yours."

links.title: Rhetoric: "No, of course not -- this time we s..."
links.text: No, of course not -- this time we shoot someone *else*!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's bad as it is -- us shooting f..."
links.text: "It's bad as it is -- us shooting firearms like punks here..." He pauses, then shrugs: "Go ahead, I'm not stopping you. Just don't hit the victim."

links.title: You: ""I'm gonna need your gun for this.""
links.text: "I'm gonna need your gun for this."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""They only have ONE GUN!""
links.text: "They only have ONE GUN!"

links.title: Inland Empire: "Oops..."
links.text: Oops...

links.title: Cuno: ""This is the sorriest pair of pigs..."
links.text: "This is the sorriest pair of pigs Cuno's ever seen."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer, why *do* we only have one..."
links.text: "Officer, why *do* we only have one gun?" he asks -- carefully loading his pistolette.

links.title: You: ""No, no. I have mine too, I'm just..."
links.text: "No, no. I have mine too, I'm just an asshole who does things in a strange order."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine, then." The piece shines in h..."
links.text: "Fine, then." The piece shines in his outstretched hand.

links.title: You: ""Remember when I told you I didn't..."
links.text: "Remember when I told you I didn't have my badge or uniform with me when I woke up -- I didn't have my gun either."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That is even *more* unfortunate th..."
links.text: "That is even *more* unfortunate than the badge. You need to contact your station about it as soon as possible." The piece shines in his outstretched hand. "Try not to lose this one, please."

links.title: Authority: "We're not off to a good start. This..."
links.text: We're not off to a good start. This missing gun business is making your hand tremble.

links.title: You: ""I think someone has stolen it from..."
links.text: "I think someone has stolen it from me, stolen my gun. Gun is stolen."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Extremely* unfortunate. You need..."
links.text: "*Extremely* unfortunate. You need to contact your station about it as soon as possible." The piece shines in his outstretched hand. "Try not to lose this one, please."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant follows suit. He fin..."
links.text: The lieutenant follows suit. He finishes loading the gun in silence, then hands it to you.

links.title: You: ""That's it. We have to ask for help..."
links.text: "That's it. We have to ask for help from the harbour." (Commit to it.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay..." He looks at the cargo bel..."
links.text: "Okay..." He looks at the cargo belt. "They *do* have the tools and the men. And since it looks like they *put* him there..."

links.title: You: ""They can get him down too.""
links.text: "They can get him down too."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He sighs. "Okay. Let's do it the lo..."
links.text: He sighs. "Okay. Let's do it the lousy, dangerous way."

links.title: You: ""But -- won't it be dangerous?""
links.text: "But -- won't it be dangerous?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""To ask the *suspects* for help wit..."
links.text: "To ask the *suspects* for help with the victim's body? To be indebted to Evrart Claire? Very much, yes -- which is why I would have preferred us to handle this ourselves."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Clearly we can't.""
links.text: "Clearly we can't."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Suck my dick, bitches!""
links.text: "Suck my dick, bitches!"

links.title: You: ""Who's Evrart Claire?""
links.text: "Who's Evrart Claire?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The leader of the Union. A dangero..."
links.text: "The leader of the Union. A dangerous and corrupt man, from what I hear -- you don't want to owe him much."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah -- don't go bein' someone els..."
links.text: "Yeah -- don't go bein' someone else's bitches. You're *Cuno's* bitches."

links.title: You: ""What's wrong with being indebted t..."
links.text: "What's wrong with being indebted to Evrart Claire?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He's a dangerous and corrupt man,..."
links.text: "He's a dangerous and corrupt man, and we cannot predict what he will want from us in return."

links.title: You: ""How do we get *inside* the harbour?""
links.text: "How do we get *inside* the harbour?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""From the gates -- by negotiating o..."
links.text: "From the gates -- by negotiating or fighting." He looks up to the east. "Or we can try the secret route we found. Where your cloak is. It looked doable."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "To the gates! Let's fight, I say!"
links.text: To the gates! Let's fight, I say!

links.title: Rhetoric: "To the gates! But we *negotiate*!"
links.text: To the gates! But we *negotiate*!

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Secret path, secret path, secret pa..."
links.text: Secret path, secret path, secret path!

links.title: Rhetoric: "To the gates! Let's negotiate!"
links.text: To the gates! Let's negotiate!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""From the gates -- by negotiating o..."
links.text: "From the gates -- by negotiating or fighting. I'm *unenthusiastic* about fighting..." He looks around. "Or we can try to find some secret third path -- it's unlikely, though."

links.title: You: ""Good job we already found a way *i..."
links.text: "Good job we already found a way *in* the harbour."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hooray for us.""
links.text: "Hooray for us."

links.title: You: ""Let's get to it then." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Let's get to it then." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""Yeah, wait -- let's reconsider." (..."
links.text: "Yeah, wait -- let's reconsider." (Consider other options first.)

links.title: The Hanged Man: "But *what* other options? The corps..."
links.text: But *what* other options? The corpse twists on the belt, like chicken on a skewer...

links.title: You: ""Maybe we can ask for help from the..."
links.text: "Maybe we can ask for help from the harbour?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I was really hoping we wouldn't --..."
links.text: "I was really hoping we wouldn't -- the Union appear to be *suspects* in this case. It seems like a dangerous route to go down."

links.title: Half Light: "Confirmed. It's unsafe."
links.text: Confirmed. It's unsafe.

links.title: Logic: "I would really prefer if there was..."
links.text: I would really prefer if there was another way. These people might have an agenda.

links.title: You: ""But what *else* can we do?" (Commi..."
links.text: "But what *else* can we do?" (Commit to it.)

links.title: You: ""I'm out of ideas. Let's have anoth..."
links.text: "I'm out of ideas. Let's have another look at him."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmmm..." The lieutenant falls deep..."
links.text: "Hmmm..." The lieutenant falls deep in thought.

links.title: You: ""Tell me, who are you, dead man?""
links.text: "Tell me, who are you, dead man?"

links.title: The Hanged Man: "I'm gone."
links.text: I'm gone.

links.title: Inland Empire: "No reply. How ever many times you k..."
links.text: No reply. How ever many times you keep asking.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Please stop trying to perform a *n..."
links.text: "Please stop trying to perform a *necromantic ritual*. We have other things to do."

links.title: Inland Empire: "The fish-lips stay silent in respon..."
links.text: The fish-lips stay silent in response. You must be losing your mind, asking him that over and over...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Who is he? He is male, forty to fi..."
links.text: "Who is he? He is male, forty to fifty. With an athletic build."

links.title: Inland Empire: "The lips of the corpse are swollen,..."
links.text: The lips of the corpse are swollen, preposterously. They are also silent. You have no idea why you just said that.

links.title: You: "I have something I need to know, co..."
links.text: I have something I need to know, corpse-man.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Of course! You have questions, don'..."
links.text: Of course! You have questions, don't you? The power of your *imagination* is at your service.

links.title: You: "How do you like it in the fridge?"
links.text: How do you like it in the fridge?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "I like it a *lot* brother. This rea..."
links.text: I like it a *lot* brother. This really is your finest hour! You're a genius -- a regular Coppolangelo!

links.title: You: "I can't get the damn compartment in..."
links.text: I can't get the damn compartment in my ledger open.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "The blue heart? Oh, that's good shi..."
links.text: The blue heart? Oh, that's good shit, you'll love it. Just press down and *fuck* it open like you always do.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Fuck it hard, Copopo the Clown."
links.text: Fuck it hard, Copopo the Clown.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "He means force. It'll work."
links.text: He means force. It'll work.

links.title: You: "At the autopsy, you said you have a..."
links.text: At the autopsy, you said you have ancient mysteries.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Oh yes, Cobo mi Lobo! In the gift h..."
links.text: Oh yes, Cobo mi Lobo! In the gift horse's mouth, tracts and wakes and waterways! Ancient materials buried...

links.title: You: "Yeah, but to *where*, brother?"
links.text: Yeah, but to *where*, brother?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Just a small gulp away, my beloved..."
links.text: Just a small gulp away, my beloved Cobo. A small gulp away.

links.title: You: "Alright."
links.text: Alright.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "It's *all* right."
links.text: It's *all* right.

links.title: You: "Which was it that killed you, then..."
links.text: Which was it that killed you, then -- love or communism?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Huh?"
links.text: Huh?

links.title: You: "You said love killed you, but when..."
links.text: You said love killed you, but when you fell down you said it was communism.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "You're misquoting me, Roonie. I sai..."
links.text: You're misquoting me, Roonie. I said communism killed me. Love *DID ME IN*.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You really need to learn the differ..."
links.text: You really need to learn the difference, buddy. This is embarrassing.

links.title: You: "Where have you gone?"
links.text: Where have you gone?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Into the wild pale yonder."
links.text: Into the wild pale yonder.

links.title: You: "Where is that?"
links.text: Where is that?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "In the past. Way out west."
links.text: In the past. Way out west.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "What was that -- 'pale yonder'? Do..."
links.text: What was that -- 'pale yonder'? Do you know what the pale is?

links.title: You: "What is the pale?"
links.text: What is the pale?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "The pale, Coppo... it spooks me out..."
links.text: The pale, Coppo... it spooks me out.

links.title: You: "Why does it spook you out?"
links.text: Why does it spook you out?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "The corpse is silent. The nose in t..."
links.text: The corpse is silent. The nose in the middle of his face is swollen, so are his cheeks. His lips are motionless.

links.title: You: "All right, I had another question."
links.text: All right, I had another question.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Of course you did, you question-lov..."
links.text: Of course you did, you question-lover.

links.title: You: "I can see you're gone, but *who* ar..."
links.text: I can see you're gone, but *who* are you?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "I'm a joke. Look at me."
links.text: I'm a joke. Look at me.

links.title: You: "There's nothing funny about you."
links.text: There's nothing funny about you.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "There is nothing funny about jokes,..."
links.text: There is nothing funny about jokes, either.

links.title: You: "Who were you when you were alive?"
links.text: Who were you when you were alive?

links.title: You: "You are now, but who were you when..."
links.text: You are now, but who were you when you were alive?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "A killer. A motherfucker and a kill..."
links.text: A killer. A motherfucker and a killer.

links.title: Half Light: "Takes one to know one."
links.text: Takes one to know one.

links.title: You: "I have another question for you."
links.text: I have another question for you.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Go ahead, Cobo."
links.text: Go ahead, Cobo.

links.title: You: "What is happening?"
links.text: What is happening?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "What do you mean?"
links.text: What do you mean?

links.title: You: "I'm talking to you."
links.text: I'm talking to you.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "It's the power of your... (Black, f..."
links.text: It's the power of your... (Black, frothy liquid starts bubbling on his lips...)

links.title: The Hanged Man: "IMAGINATION."
links.text: IMAGINATION.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Yeah, man, don't be *crazy*. Inanim..."
links.text: Yeah, man, don't be *crazy*. Inanimate objects and dead people can't really talk to you, your *wild imagination* is doing this -- ask some more of those questions you love so much!

links.title: The Hanged Man: "He *loves* those."
links.text: He *loves* those.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Go ahead, ask me more questions. Yo..."
links.text: Go ahead, ask me more questions. You fucking *love* questions.

links.title: You: "Never mind, I wanted to..."
links.text: Never mind, I wanted to...

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Ask me more questions? You fucking..."
links.text: Ask me more questions? You fucking *love* questions.

links.title: You: "Why *do* I love questions so much?"
links.text: Why *do* I love questions so much?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Because you're a copparooni. Look a..."
links.text: Because you're a copparooni. Look at all of them go! Do you want more questions?

links.title: You: "No, I'm good."
links.text: No, I'm good.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Your loss, *coppodoppo*. Would've b..."
links.text: Your loss, *coppodoppo*. Would've been so primo...

links.title: You: "Yeah, give me questions."
links.text: Yeah, give me questions.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Here you go, you loonie!"
links.text: Here you go, you loonie!

links.title: You: "Give me a comical amount of questio..."
links.text: Give me a comical amount of questions.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Comin' right up, copporooni Roonie...."
links.text: Comin' right up, copporooni Roonie. This is getting up-beat now!

links.title: You: "Is my name Roonie?"
links.text: Is my name Roonie?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Fuck no, you're no Roonie."
links.text: Fuck no, you're no Roonie.

links.title: You: "I do strike myself as a Roonie."
links.text: I do strike myself as a Roonie.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "No, you don't. Between you and me,..."
links.text: No, you don't. Between you and me, your name is probably Harry.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "That's right. Stupid, boring Harry...."
links.text: That's right. Stupid, boring Harry. Harry the Motherfucker.

links.title: You: "Roonie is not who I am. I'm Harry."
links.text: Roonie is not who I am. I'm Harry.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "No, you're not a Harry either. You'..."
links.text: No, you're not a Harry either. You're a motherfucker. That's who you are, Roonie the Motherfucker.

links.title: You: "Roonie is obviously not who I am."
links.text: Roonie is obviously not who I am.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Between you and me, your name is pr..."
links.text: Between you and me, your name is probably Harry.

links.title: You: "I feel like I've been getting a lot..."
links.text: I feel like I've been getting a lot of Harry lately...

links.title: The Hanged Man: "You might be on to something there."
links.text: You might be on to something there.

links.title: You: "No, it can't be Harry. I refuse."
links.text: No, it can't be Harry. I refuse.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Good for you."
links.text: Good for you.

links.title: You: "Could I really be Harry?"
links.text: Could I really be Harry?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "You can be anything you wanna be, b..."
links.text: You can be anything you wanna be, brother Coppo.

links.title: You: "Right, I'm the Tequila Sunset."
links.text: Right, I'm the Tequila Sunset.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "You ain't no Tequila Sunset, you're..."
links.text: You ain't no Tequila Sunset, you're probably just Harry or something. That's right... *Harry*.

links.title: You: "Of course not. The name is Raphaël..."
links.text: Of course not. The name is Raphaël Ambrosius Costeau.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Listen to yourself... You're not a..."
links.text: Listen to yourself... You're not a Raphaël anything. You're probably just Harry or something. That's right... *Harry*.

links.title: You: "Why do I feel like I've forgotten s..."
links.text: Why do I feel like I've forgotten something terrible?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Because you *have*."
links.text: Because you *have*.

links.title: You: "Who killed you?"
links.text: Who killed you?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Love did me in, brother Coppo. It w..."
links.text: Love did me in, brother Coppo. It was love all along...

links.title: You: "Can *you* ask me a question?"
links.text: Can *you* ask me a question?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Sure, Lobo, I can ask you a questio..."
links.text: Sure, Lobo, I can ask you a question: Why are you doing this?

links.title: You: "What?"
links.text: What?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Looking at my face, motionless. Loo..."
links.text: Looking at my face, motionless. Looking into my eyes. Standing here. Why are you investigating my murder?

links.title: You: "I don't have anything else to do. T..."
links.text: I don't have anything else to do. This case is all I have.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "*I'm* all you have? Then you truly..."
links.text: *I'm* all you have? Then you truly lost it all, brother. You let the world drag it all away from you, and what it left, you pissed away -- and here we are.

links.title: You: "Because he told me to. (Nod toward..."
links.text: Because he told me to. (Nod toward Kim.)

links.title: The Hanged Man: "You're a lying sack of shit, coppo...."
links.text: You're a lying sack of shit, coppo. You're doing this because there is *nothing* else to do. Everything else is over. It's just *me* now.

links.title: You: "Maybe this will lead to something?..."
links.text: Maybe this will lead to something? Something indescribable. Unforeseen. Miraculous?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Hah! The clown lips on the corpse a..."
links.text: Hah! The clown lips on the corpse appear to smile.

links.title: Shivers: "Something is on its way. Something..."
links.text: Something is on its way. Something hidden. It's coming, a miracle -- from the northwest -- and it's almost here. You can feel it in the air on your hands, the cold spring air smoothing them over.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Hah! The clown lips on the corpse a..."
links.text: Hah! The clown lips on the corpse appear to smile. The face rotates before you, slowly...

links.title: You: "I hate you. You stink and you're bo..."
links.text: I hate you. You stink and you're boring.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Do I remind you of someone?"
links.text: Do I remind you of someone?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "A child born with Moller's disease..."
links.text: A child born with Moller's disease -- Harlequinism -- grown up miraculously.

links.title: You: "A deep sea creature."
links.text: A deep sea creature.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "No, not quite... Be fair now."
links.text: No, not quite... Be fair now.

links.title: You: "Myself -- in the bathroom mirror."
links.text: Myself -- in the bathroom mirror.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "There you go -- look at that bright..."
links.text: There you go -- look at that bright kid! We're birds of a feather, you and I. Soon you will be just like me, just keep drinkin' and havin' a good time. It's a matter of weeks.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Feeling nausea? Vomiting? Tendernes..."
links.text: Feeling nausea? Vomiting? Tenderness or pain around the liver area? Tiny red lines on the skin above waist level? More like *days*, Coppo. The clock is ticking, your liver tells you so.

links.title: You: "A baby affected with harlequinism."
links.text: A baby affected with harlequinism.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "You sure wriggled out of that one,..."
links.text: You sure wriggled out of that one, Coppolini!

links.title: You: "You don't remind me of anyone."
links.text: You don't remind me of anyone.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Sure I do -- you just don't want to..."
links.text: Sure I do -- you just don't want to admit it.

links.title: You: "Why were you feeling pleasure when..."
links.text: Why were you feeling pleasure when you died?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Maybe I was getting my rocks off?"
links.text: Maybe I was getting my rocks off?

links.title: You: "First, do you have to speak like th..."
links.text: First, do you have to speak like that? What dialect is that, anyway?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "It's a mish-mash, Coppobollo. You t..."
links.text: It's a mish-mash, Coppobollo. You think I'm Messinian, don't you? For you, this is how people from Messina speak like.

links.title: You: "I'm not even sure what Messina is."
links.text: I'm not even sure what Messina is.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Well, I'm not *from* Messina, am I?..."
links.text: Well, I'm not *from* Messina, am I? My hair is too light a shade of brown. Trust your inner racist.

links.title: You: "What are you, racist now too?"
links.text: What are you, racist now too?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "You think I am. You think I was a r..."
links.text: You think I am. You think I was a racist because this lump looks like military and has tattoos. That's called *profiling*.

links.title: You: "I *always* trust my inner racist. H..."
links.text: I *always* trust my inner racist. He shows me the score.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Yeah, well, he seems to think I'm a..."
links.text: Yeah, well, he seems to think I'm also a racist since I have tattoos and a military body build. It's called *profiling*.

links.title: You: "Are you? From Messina?"
links.text: Are you? From Messina?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "No. My hair is too light a shade of..."
links.text: No. My hair is too light a shade of brown. My eyebrows too. Trust your inner racist.

links.title: You: "So -- you were feeling sexual arous..."
links.text: So -- you were feeling sexual arousal when they were hanging you?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Do I look like an erotic auto-asphy..."
links.text: Do I look like an erotic auto-asphyxiation type to you?

links.title: You: "Yes."
links.text: Yes.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Captain Coppodromo, I fear we are d..."
links.text: Captain Coppodromo, I fear we are drifting away, fixating on sexuality again... let's go with a simpler question.

links.title: Logic: "He didn't choke himself. You know i..."
links.text: He didn't choke himself. You know it.

links.title: You: "No."
links.text: No.

links.title: You: "What is erotic auto-asphyxiation?"
links.text: What is erotic auto-asphyxiation?

links.title: You: "Forget it."
links.text: Forget it.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "I know what this means -- more ques..."
links.text: I know what this means -- more questions.

links.title: You: "Enough."
links.text: Enough.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "You can come back and look into thi..."
links.text: You can come back and look into this face any time you want. Ask me your little questions, freshen your memory. Create associations, remind yourself of your *mortality*, Coppolopo.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Two: Initial examination of the vi..."
links.text: "Two: Initial examination of the victim. We were *exhaustive* in our efforts there. Good job."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Three: Field autopsy. This will *n..."
links.text: "Three: Field autopsy. This will *not* be pleasant. Or easy. And it *will* have to be performed on the scene."

links.title: Cuno: ""The fuck are they on about?""
links.text: "The fuck are they on about?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Cops are gonna cut his shit up nex..."
links.text: "Cops are gonna cut his shit up next."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Four and final: transport of the c..."
links.text: "Four and final: transport of the coroner's case to the district morgue. I'll do that." The lieutenant stops. "God, he stinks."

links.title: You: ""Don't we have someone else for the..."
links.text: "Don't we have someone else for the autopsy -- like a doctor?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. You and I are *detectives*. Th..."
links.text: "No. You and I are *detectives*. The honorary rank of 'detective' signifies our ability to handle *the entire incident chain*. From crime scene, to autopsy, to clean-up. We do it all."

links.title: You: ""Honorary rank?""
links.text: "Honorary rank?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""An honour -- and a burden. Attache..."
links.text: "An honour -- and a burden. Attached to your rank. Mine is *lieutenant-detective* -- unfortunately. I can't tell you how tired I am of this corpse..."

links.title: Endurance: "He is growing truly tired of it, it..."
links.text: He is growing truly tired of it, it's not merely moodiness. His tolerance limit is near.

links.title: You: ""Yes, I feel like a detective.""
links.text: "Yes, I feel like a detective."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Your station would not have assign..."
links.text: "Your station would not have assigned you the case otherwise. This case is *important*."

links.title: You: ""I don't think I'm a detective.""
links.text: "I don't think I'm a detective."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""With shooting like that -- of cour..."
links.text: "With shooting like that -- of course you are. Your station would not have assigned you to this case otherwise."

links.title: You: ""Got it.""
links.text: "Got it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good.""
links.text: "Good."

links.title: You: ""Wait -- field *autopsy*?!""
links.text: "Wait -- field *autopsy*?!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes." He covers his nose. "The fou..."
links.text: "Yes." He covers his nose. "The four phases of a murder scene. One: Investigation of the scene."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm satisfied with that part. The..."
links.text: "I'm satisfied with that part. The trash container, the prints -- we've been thorough enough."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Two: Initial examination of the vi..."
links.text: "Two: Initial examination of the victim. We were not exhaustive in our efforts, should have looked at the tattoos maybe? But what's done is done."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can't say I'm satisfied with tha..."
links.text: "I can't say I'm satisfied with that part yet. I still want to know what's in that trash container..." He points to it.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can't say I'm *fully* satisfied..."
links.text: "I can't say I'm *fully* satisfied with that part. We should search for prints maybe..." He points to the spring mud around you.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can't say I'm satisfied with tha..."
links.text: "I can't say I'm satisfied with that part yet. We should search for prints maybe..." He stops to look at the spring mud. "And the trash container too..."

links.title: You: ""All right." (Give him back his gun..."
links.text: "All right." (Give him back his gun.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He holsters it. "I *would* suggest..."
links.text: He holsters it. "I *would* suggest we interview Evrart and Joyce -- the leader of the Union and the Wild Pines rep -- but we've already done that. So... it's up to you detective. Take us where we need to be."

links.title: Authority: "He trusts you have plenty of things..."
links.text: He trusts you have plenty of things in the task chain, lined up.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In the meantime, we should locate..."
links.text: "In the meantime, we should locate the representative of the logistics company. My preliminary information suggests the Wild Pines have sent a strike negotiator to wrangle back control from the Union."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I bet she has a *fresh* perspectiv..."
links.text: "I bet she has a *fresh* perspective to offer us. Since we've already talked to Evrart in the harbour -- that interview is done. For better or for worse."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In the meantime, we should try to..."
links.text: "In the meantime, we should try to interview Evrart Claire, the leader of the Union. Harbour property was clearly used in the hanging..." He points to the belt. "The harbour just east of here. Getting *in* might prove a challenge, though..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I would also suggest we interview..."
links.text: "I would also suggest we interview Joyce, the Wild Pines representative, but we've already done that. So -- good for us. One down, one to go."

links.title: You: ""Is this the famous *list of initia..."
links.text: "Is this the famous *list of initial interviews*?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes..." He nods slowly. "And those..."
links.text: "Yes..." He nods slowly. "And those were the interviewees. Let's go."

links.title: You: "Let's go then. [Leave.]"
links.text: Let's go then. [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Or* we could talk to the represen..."
links.text: "*Or* we could talk to the representative of the logistics company again. I know we already met Joyce, but that didn't count as an interview. We need to ask her how the strike and lynching are *connected*."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "You could ask the Gardener for dire..."
links.text: You could ask the Gardener for directions!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Or* we could ask around for the r..."
links.text: "*Or* we could ask around for the representative of the logistics company. My initial information says the Wild Pines have sent some sort of *strike negotiator* to wrangle control back from Evrart."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Two: Initial examination of the vi..."
links.text: "Two: Initial examination of the victim. We were pretty good in our efforts -- and the autopsy will provide another chance."

links.title: You: ""What's wrong with being indebted t..."
links.text: "What's wrong with being indebted to Evrart Claire?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He's a dangerous and corrupt man,..."
links.text: "He's a dangerous and corrupt man, and we cannot predict what he will want from us in return."

links.title: You: ""But what about the body?""
links.text: "But what about the body?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We need to access the harbour and..."
links.text: "We need to access the harbour and ask the leader of the Union to have it taken down. They have the tools -- and they have men."

links.title: You: ""Why didn't we just *begin* with th..."
links.text: "Why didn't we just *begin* with that?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I did not want us to be indebted t..."
links.text: "I did not want us to be indebted to Evrart Claire. I wanted us to be able to deal with it ourselves. That is *clearly* not the case. We need help."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""You need to SUCK MY DICK! Why the..."
links.text: "You need to SUCK MY DICK! Why the fuck am I still *alive?!*"

links.title: You: ""Who's Evrart Claire?""
links.text: "Who's Evrart Claire?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The leader of the Union. A dangero..."
links.text: "The leader of the Union. A dangerous and corrupt man. One you don't want to be *indebted* to."

links.title: You: ""Okay." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Okay." [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I suggest we go to the harbour and..."
links.text: "I suggest we go to the harbour and ask the leader of the Union to help us with the body -- I would have preferred us not to owe the Union anything, but we clearly cannot do this ourselves. Let's go."

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: The Hanged Man: "There he still is -- looking right..."
dialogueTree.text: There he still is -- looking right through you with his white eyes. The body below is entirely dedicated to that corpse smell. Emitting it is *all* it does now.

links.title: You: ""God... what is that? Why is it so..."
links.text: "God... what is that? Why is it so bad?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Active decay." The lieutenant rais..."
links.text: "Active decay." The lieutenant raises a white piece of linen to his nose. "It's okay to throw up, officer. No one is judging."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""He's about to blow! The cop's gonn..."
links.text: "He's about to blow! The cop's gonna blow, Cuno!"

links.title: The Hanged Man: "The corpse looks at you with mute,..."
links.text: The corpse looks at you with mute, liquefying eyes. A dark froth-like liquid has gathered on his lips. It's sickening.

links.title: You: "Let go of your nose without throwin..."
links.text: Let go of your nose without throwing up.

links.title: Endurance: "You crack open the ammonia ampoule..."
links.text: You crack open the ammonia ampoule and breathe in. The odour of death is still stronger. It's a spell of the mind telling you to run -- and your stomach to wring itself empty. With your eyes squinting you stand in it.

links.title: Conceptualization: "It's a puzzle -- what's hanging in..."
links.text: It's a puzzle -- what's hanging in front of you is a puzzle of decaying flesh, tattoos, and tendons.

links.title: Half Light: "Your muscles tense up. The vision i..."
links.text: Your muscles tense up. The vision in your dead angle darkens. You feel the sudden urge to push your hand into his soft gut.

links.title: Volition: "The spell has no effect. You stand..."
links.text: The spell has no effect. You stand eye to eye with it, the odour washing through you.

links.title: Interfacing: "This delicate machine, ready for pi..."
links.text: This delicate machine, ready for picking... Instinctively you crack your fingers.

links.title: You: ""Do they always do that?""
links.text: "Do they always do that?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""They do after seven days, yes. We'..."
links.text: "They do after seven days, yes. We're deep in decomposition here."

links.title: You: "Step closer."
links.text: Step closer.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "The man before you is naked, but fo..."
links.text: The man before you is naked, but for a pair of underpants and enameled boots. His skin is greenish, marbled with decaying veins and blotched by lividity. A fading web of tattoos covers his chest and shoulders. The cargo belt used to fasten him to the branch above appears industrial in strength.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "The man before you is naked, but fo..."
links.text: The man before you is naked, but for a pair of underpants and enameled boots. His skin is greenish, marbled with decaying veins and blotched by lividity. A fading web of tattoos covers his chest and shoulders. The cargo belt used to fasten him to the branch above appears industrial in strength.

links.title: Endurance: "As you breathe in, the odour comes..."
links.text: As you breathe in, the odour comes over you. It's a spell of the mind telling you to run -- and your stomach to wring itself empty. With your hands at your sides and your eyes squinting you stand in it.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "The corpse appears to laugh at you,..."
links.text: The corpse appears to laugh at you, black froth bubbling on it's lips. Every molecule in this body reeks of death. It's *still* too much, you feel it coming up again...

links.title: Endurance: "It's especially painful this time...."
links.text: It's especially painful this time. You've thrown up so much there's nary anything left down there. Hot tears of pain streak down your face -- you're crying too. Crying and convulsing at the same time.

links.title: You: ""I failed *AGAIN*!""
links.text: "I failed *AGAIN*!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant is clearly at a loss..."
links.text: The lieutenant is clearly at a loss.

links.title: You: ""What do I do now?""
links.text: "What do I do now?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer, you just need to be stron..."
links.text: "Officer, you just need to be stronger. Learn to keep it in long enough for us to work. There's nothing else *to* do."

links.title: Volition: "Relax. It's okay if you don't make..."
links.text: Relax. It's okay if you don't make it today -- the bloated corpse isn't going anywhere.

links.title: Logic: "Maybe it's okay if you don't make i..."
links.text: Maybe it's okay if you don't make it *today*? The dead man isn't going anywhere -- and there's always other things to do...

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "You can open this White Check again..."
links.text: You can open this White Check again by going to your CHARACTER SHEET and spending a skill point to upgrade your Endurance. Gain new skill points by exploring and completing side-tasks.

links.title: You: ""...even though I got my shit compr..."
links.text: "...even though I got my shit compressed!? How is it possible?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I am at a loss as well. I could *s..."
links.text: "I am at a loss as well. I could *swear* your shit was together, detective."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Sometimes even that is not enough....."
links.text: Sometimes even that is not enough... Life is unfair.

links.title: You: "Just cry."
links.text: Just cry.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Little black bubbles pop on the cor..."
links.text: Little black bubbles pop on the corpse's lips, decay liquid like tar. It's like he's gurgling.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "The corpse appears to laugh at you,..."
links.text: The corpse appears to laugh at you, black froth bubbling on it's lips. Every molecule in this body reeks of death. It's *still* too much, you feel it coming up again...

links.title: Endurance: "The ammonia only makes it worse! Th..."
links.text: The ammonia only makes it worse! The combination forces tears out of your ducts. You manage to keep it in once...

links.title: Endurance: "The second time -- not so much. Whe..."
links.text: The second time -- not so much. When the vomiting is done your cheeks are wet with tears.

links.title: You: ""The ammonia didn't help at all...""
links.text: "The ammonia didn't help at all..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Nor does the wind right now..." Yo..."
links.text: "Nor does the wind right now..." You feel the lieutenant pat your back, rhythmically.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The weight is reassuring. Like a cr..."
links.text: The weight is reassuring. Like a crenel on solid fortification. Pat pat pat...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I've seen strong men turn themselv..."
links.text: "I've seen strong men turn themselves inside out for hours. You're facing tough odds here. Alcohol withdrawal makes it considerably harder."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "WHAT IS HAPPENING TO YOU?!?! Are yo..."
links.text: WHAT IS HAPPENING TO YOU?!?! Are you going to CRY now, son?

links.title: Volition: "You heard the coach! This is weakne..."
links.text: You heard the coach! This is weakness. It cannot go on much longer, or you will LOSE.

links.title: You: ""Why can't I keep it in if I've bee..."
links.text: "Why can't I keep it in if I've been a cop my whole life?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I've seen *captains* puke their gu..."
links.text: "I've seen *captains* puke their guts out. It never gets easier, you never get used to the smell. Every Monday is cadaver day -- throw up, investigate, throw up, initial autopsy, throw up, bag it..." He pats your back again.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then drive to the station, maybe t..."
links.text: "Then drive to the station, maybe throw up on the way there if you didn't bag the thing tight enough."

links.title: You: ""You seem to be fine.""
links.text: "You seem to be fine."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think I've lost my sense of smel..."
links.text: "I think I've lost my sense of smell." There's a pause.

links.title: Drama: "A white lie."
links.text: A white lie.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not being hungover helps too.""
links.text: "Not being hungover helps too."

links.title: You: ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Monday -- make sure you bring a ha..."
links.text: "Monday -- make sure you bring a handkerchief."

links.title: You: ""Give me a moment. I got this. Let'..."
links.text: "Give me a moment. I got this. Let's try *again*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""An appropriate attitude." He withd..."
links.text: "An appropriate attitude." He withdraws his hand and looks you in the eye:

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You need to get your shit together.""
links.text: "You need to get your shit together."

links.title: You: "Say nothing -- just nod."
links.text: Say nothing -- just nod.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should go talk to the locals, f..."
links.text: "We should go talk to the locals, find something else to do while the wind changes. It's pretty bad right now."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Give it half an hour, get yourself..."
links.text: "Give it half an hour, get yourself together, then come back and have another go."

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "You've gained a Thought! When this..."
links.text: You've gained a Thought! When this dialogue is over, go to your THOUGHT CABINET and INTERNALIZE it for special bonuses and effects.

links.title: You: ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: You: "(Shake your head.) "No.""
links.text: (Shake your head.) "No."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No?" The lieutenant's expression i..."
links.text: "No?" The lieutenant's expression is stern and impenetrable. He points at you: "You *will* get your shit together."

links.title: Empathy: "You're sure this has not affected h..."
links.text: You're sure this has not affected his impression of you in a good way.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "For a moment, the hanged man appear..."
links.text: For a moment, the hanged man appears to smile. His lips are red like a clown's.

links.title: Cuno: ""Bitch-fight, C. Bitches are at it.""
links.text: "Bitch-fight, C. Bitches are at it."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Mhm, bitches about to kill each ot..."
links.text: "Mhm, bitches about to kill each other, I think."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant pays no heed: "We sh..."
links.text: The lieutenant pays no heed: "We should go and do something else. Give it half an hour. Then come back, when you've gotten your act together."

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "You've gained a Thought! When this..."
links.text: You've gained a Thought! When this dialogue is over, go to your THOUGHT CABINET and INTERNALIZE it for special bonuses and effects.

links.title: You: ""But I don't wanna get my shit toge..."
links.text: "But I don't wanna get my shit together!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then the world will turn away from..."
links.text: "Then the world will turn away from you, and leave you behind."

links.title: You: ""But my shit already *is* together!""
links.text: "But my shit already *is* together!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, it's not officer.""
links.text: "No, it's not officer."

links.title: You: ""This is *bullshit*. I don't wanna..."
links.text: "This is *bullshit*. I don't wanna do this anymore. I don't wanna be a cop."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay. You've said it. You needed t..."
links.text: "Okay. You've said it. You needed to say it, and now that you have..." He withdraws his hand from your back and looks you in the eye:

links.title: You: ""Can't we do something else? I thin..."
links.text: "Can't we do something else? I think I want to solve something else now."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's probably a good idea. Clear..."
links.text: "That's probably a good idea. Clear our heads. But before we can do that..." He withdraws his hand from your back and looks you in the eye:

links.title: You: ""Do it without me. I just can't kee..."
links.text: "Do it without me. I just can't keep it down."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. This is a two-man assignment,..."
links.text: "No. This is a two-man assignment, because it needs two officers to complete. I need your help." He withdraws his hand and looks you in the eye:

links.title: Volition: "You are being weak. This is weaknes..."
links.text: You are being weak. This is weakness -- and it cannot go on much longer, or you will LOSE.

links.title: You: ""I think I don't wanna be a cop any..."
links.text: "I think I don't wanna be a cop anymore..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Get a hold of yourself." You feel..."
links.text: "Get a hold of yourself." You feel the lieutenant pat your back, rhythmically.

links.title: You: "Spit and wipe your mouth with the h..."
links.text: Spit and wipe your mouth with the handkerchief.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Are you okay, officer?" You feel t..."
links.text: "Are you okay, officer?" You feel the lieutenant pat you on the back. Heavy, rhythmic pats.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The weight is reassuring. Like a cr..."
links.text: The weight is reassuring. Like a crenel on solid fortification. Pat pat pat...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're facing tough odds here. It'..."
links.text: "You're facing tough odds here. It's aggravated further by alcohol withdrawal."

links.title: You: "Spit and say nothing."
links.text: Spit and say nothing.

links.title: Endurance: "You try to -- very professionally -..."
links.text: You try to -- very professionally -- look at the corpse, but your stomach contracts. You manage to keep it in once...

links.title: Endurance: "The smell is repulsive. It pushes i..."
links.text: The smell is repulsive. It pushes in from your mouth, more instant and more familiar than anything you'd expected; more fever than odour. It fills your mind, flushing you from within.

links.title: You: "Try to walk away."
links.text: Try to walk away.

links.title: Endurance: "Too late. It's impossible to keep i..."
links.text: Too late. It's impossible to keep it in. Your body curls and pushes it out. Burst by burst...

links.title: Endurance: "Until a pool of vomit lies under yo..."
links.text: Until a pool of vomit lies under your feet -- and your throat stings from the stomach acid.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "The smell of Commodore Red rises fr..."
links.text: The smell of Commodore Red rises from the pool. Among it, distilled spirit and bits of shish-kebab.

links.title: You: ""God...""
Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's okay, happens to everyone." T..."
links.text: "It's okay, happens to everyone." The lieutenant hands you his white handkerchief: "Keep it."

links.title: You: ""Thanks." (Wipe your mouth.)"
links.text: "Thanks." (Wipe your mouth.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The hangover is clearly making thi..."
links.text: "The hangover is clearly making this worse for you. You could use some ammonia -- to clear your head."

links.title: You: ""You think ammonia would help?""
links.text: "You think ammonia would help?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you can handle the headache," h..."
links.text: "If you can handle the headache," he nods. "Some officers use it to deal with cadaverine odour."

links.title: You: ""But not you?""
links.text: "But not you?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can't handle the headache.""
links.text: "I can't handle the headache."

links.title: Endurance: "It's more likely he can handle the..."
links.text: It's more likely he can handle the smell. Unlike you.

links.title: You: ""Okay -- where do we get ammonia fr..."
links.text: "Okay -- where do we get ammonia from?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That young woman, the gardener, me..."
links.text: "That young woman, the gardener, mentioned she used salts for the smell." He nods toward the plaza.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If she doesn't have any, there mig..."
links.text: "If she doesn't have any, there might be some in the Frittte store nearby."

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "Acquiring Ammonia will provide a MO..."
links.text: Acquiring Ammonia will provide a MODIFIER to the White Check. MODIFIERS make checks easier -- and allow you to retry them.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There's the Frittte nearby -- mayb..."
links.text: "There's the Frittte nearby -- maybe they have some in their apothecary? If they don't..." He points to the greenhouse.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There's a greenhouse here -- and a..."
links.text: "There's a greenhouse here -- and a gardener with a wheelbarrow on the corner of the Whirling-in-Rags. If she works here she might have something for the smell."

links.title: Logic: "Hmm... pretty clever."
links.text: Hmm... pretty clever.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There's Frittte nearby, east of th..."
links.text: "There's Frittte nearby, east of the hostel. They usually have a small apothecary. If they don't..." He points to the greenhouse.

links.title: You: ""I don't need that shit.""
links.text: "I don't need that shit."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sure you do. You just threw up *a..."
links.text: "Sure you do. You just threw up *a lot*."

links.title: You: ""I don't need your pity.""
links.text: "I don't need your pity."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not *pity*. You should wipe y..."
links.text: "It's not *pity*. You should wipe your mouth after vomiting." He pockets the handkerchief.

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry.""
links.text: "I'm sorry."

links.title: You: ""Fucking corpse.""
links.text: "Fucking corpse."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Keep it." The lieutenant hands you..."
links.text: "Keep it." The lieutenant hands you a blue checkered handkerchief.

links.title: You: ""God... this sucks.""
links.text: "God... this sucks."

links.title: The Hanged Man: "The corpse looks at no particular d..."
links.text: The corpse looks at no particular direction with its bulging eyes. Its mouth is silent.

links.title: You: ""Didn't that young woman, the garde..."
links.text: "Didn't that young woman, the gardener, mention using salts for the smell? Or maybe they sell ammonia at the local grocery store..."

links.title: The Hanged Man: "You can feel it coming up again. Th..."
links.text: You can feel it coming up again. The corpse twirls in the wind.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "If the lieutenant were here he woul..."
links.text: If the lieutenant were here he would have an idea what to do. But he isn't. He's somewhere filling paperwork. Looks like you'll just have to work it out on your own.

links.title: You: ""What now?""
links.text: "What now?"

links.title: You: ""Fucking corpse.""
links.text: "Fucking corpse."

links.title: You: "Let it out."
links.text: Let it out.

links.title: Endurance: "You feel a great force wringing you..."
links.text: You feel a great force wringing you from the stomach. Your body curls and pushes it out. Burst by burst...

links.title: Endurance: "The smell is repulsive. It pushes i..."
links.text: The smell is repulsive. It pushes in from your mouth, more instant and more familiar than anything you'd expected; more fever than odour. It fills your mind, flushing you from within.

links.title: You: "Turn away. [Leave.]"
links.text: Turn away. [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: The Hanged Man: "The corpse looks at you with bulgin..."
dialogueTree.text: The corpse looks at you with bulging white eyes. The face around them does not look human, it's swollen and ready to burst. His lips are fishlike and his tongue like a ball gag in his mouth.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "You seem to be holding your breath."
links.text: You seem to be holding your breath.

links.title: You: "Look down."
links.text: Look down.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "A cargo belt twists his neck at an..."
links.text: A cargo belt twists his neck at an unnatural angle. The body below appears stiff. It's letting out an ungodly rot, the smell seeps in even through your clenched nostrils.

links.title: You: "Turn away. [Leave.]"
links.text: Turn away. [Leave.]
